descriptionlist.description:
Monitor and terminate/throttle CPU hogging processes

Vedette is a CPU usage monitoring tweak for processes in iOS like apps and daemons, and terminate it when they violate the maximum allowed percentage.

Features:
  • Monitor CPU usage for apps and daemons

  • Terminate/throttle processes that violate CPU limits

  • Configurable CPU percentage and interval for each process


This package tested to be working on iOS 14.3. Might or might not work on other iOS version. Theoretically, it should works on iOS 10+



To support development: https://www.paypal.me/udevs
